definition: "ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
Duyun city in Guizhou, capital of Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南布依族苗族自治州
Duyun city in Guizhou, capital of Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南布依族苗族自治州

sentences.english: How did you get them iced so evenly?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能把奶油涂这么匀呢？

sentences.english: Rub cucumber slices with 1 tbsp salt.
sentences.chinese: 用1汤匙盐放入黄瓜段里撮匀。

sentences.english: Given the laser being smoothed, the SBS energy to the back-scattering direction became bigger.
sentences.chinese: 在匀滑条件下，越靠近背反方向，散射光能量越大。

sentences.english: The homogeneous cell-based assay can be performed in multi-well plates.
sentences.chinese: 这种基于细胞的匀相检测法可在多孔板中完成。

sentences.english: Clean and rinse cuttlefish , wipe dry; rub with ginger wine and set aside for a while.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼清洗干净后抺干，用姜汁酒搽匀腌片刻。

sentences.english: The homogeneity of magnetic field produced by three parallel coaxial circular coils(TPCC) is analyzed through calculating.
sentences.chinese: 对平行共轴三个圆形线圈形成的匀强磁场进行了研究。

sentences.english: Season salmon steaks with salt, pepper and Oliver oil, coat all over.
sentences.chinese: 洒盐和黑胡椒，橄榄油在鱼排的两面，并抹匀调味。

sentences.english: The new machine distributes seeds evenly and quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那新机器播种又快又匀。

sentences.english: Coat your skin in a thin, even layer.
sentences.chinese: 在你的皮肤上涂上又薄又匀的一层。

sentences.english: "We live in a cyber cocoon enveloping the Earth, " Baker said.
sentences.chinese: “我们生活在被网络茧壳包裹的地球上，”贝克匀说。

sentences.english: Objective To define the antiviral activity of Musca domestica larva homogenate.
sentences.chinese: 目的确定家蝇幼虫匀浆液的抗病毒作用。

sentences.english: Add some salt, water and knead properly.
sentences.chinese: 加入一些盐，水并把面粉和匀。

definition: to mix/to mix in/to toss (a salad)
spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
maltose syrup/molasses/heavy (eyelids)/drowsy-eyed/listless/(of dough, candy etc) to soften/to become soft and sticky
Gorgon plant/fox nut (Gorgon euryale or Euryale ferox)/makhana (Hindi)
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
